overview: Willy is a lonely individual. He is also the youngest son. His mother keeps phoning him to complain about the fact that he is different from his older brothers. He also persistently receives hard complaints from his teacher at school. He only feels happiness during very few nights. The routine of anger and loneliness continues.
tagline: Willy is living a lonely life in the shadow of his older brothers.
title: In Middle Of The Blackhole
